sections.title: Mortal Usher (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Mortal Usher class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Mortal Usher)
sections.description: Grants proficiency with whips and scythes specifically for mortal ushers.

sections.title: Reaping Strike (Su) (Mortal Usher)
sections.description: Adds scaling bonus damage (positive energy to undead, negative energy to living) when using attack actions, single-target spells, or alchemical items as standard actions.

sections.title: Vital Strike (Mortal Usher)
sections.description: Grants Vital Strike feat at 1st level and Improved Vital Strike at 6th level, using class level as base attack bonus for feat prerequisites.

sections.title: Mortal Talents (Mortal Usher)
sections.description: Allows continued advancement in a chosen previous class, gaining class features every 2 levels while retaining prestige class HD, BAB, saves, and skill ranks.

sections.title: Nosoi Plague Mask (Su) (Mortal Usher)
sections.description: Conjures a supernatural plague mask that grants invisibility and a fascinate ability affecting both living and undead creatures.

sections.title: Calming Aura (Su) (Mortal Usher)
sections.description: Emits a 30-foot aura that functions as calm emotions, suppressible as a swift action.

sections.title: Dedicated Wrappings (Su) (Mortal Usher)
sections.description: Designates clothing as magical wrappings that provide natural armor and function as an enchantable whip with various weapon properties.

sections.title: Vanth Wings (Ex) (Mortal Usher)
sections.description: Grants 60-foot fly speed with good maneuverability, cold resistance, and bonuses to Acrobatics and concentration checks.

sections.title: Yamaraj-Feather Cloak (Su) (Mortal Usher)
sections.description: Provides immunity to electricity and death effects, converting electricity damage into healing and temporary hit points.
